title: NFL ATL: Live from the combine!
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Live from the combine!
description:
An arena full of heroes -- Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- deliver all the goods from the 2014 NFL Scouting Combine. The heroes check in live from Lucas Oil Stadium, where they pick apart the weekend’s biggest headlines and surprises. Which prospects, coaches and general managers impressed the heroes the most? What have they learned about the Jim Harbaugh to the Cleveland Browns rumors? Who was caught in Indy on a fast food walk of shame? All this and more on the latest episode of the “Around The League Podcast,” so tune in and join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
